AboutUsPage.title: About us
AboutUsPage.firstParagraph: Exporteru is an online service designed to promote the export of products manufactured in Russia. Focusing on the business sector (B2B), we facilitate interaction between companies on the international stage.
AboutUsPage.secondParagraph: Our specialty is finding foreign counterparties for you through a multifunctional online platform. This is a great opportunity for enterprises of different scales, from various sectors and regions, to connect to the dynamically developing global market.
AboutUsPage.thirdParagraph: Comprehensive support and assistance for your company at all stages - from placing goods on the resource to concluding an export contract. A personal manager will be assigned to you for the entire period of service use.
AboutUsPage.fourthParagraph: Our main goal is to increase your international sales! In the process, we identify your main needs for export operations and make every effort to satisfy them.
AboutUsPage.fifthParagraph: Start exporting with us today, and you will automatically come to the attention of buyers from China, Turkey and Southeast Asian countries.
AboutUsPage.efficiency: Efficiency and control in every transaction
AboutUsPage.unifiedCenter: Unified center for all raw material needs
AboutUsPage.joinTitle: Join Exporteru and discover new horizons for your business

1.title: General provisions
1.text: This personal data processing policy is compiled in accordance with the requirements of Federal Law No. 152-FZ dated July 27, 2006 "On Personal Data" (hereinafter - the Personal Data Law) and defines the procedure for processing personal data and measures to ensure the security of personal data taken by LLC 'EXPORTERU' (hereinafter - the Operator)
1.1-1: The Operator sets as its most important goal and condition for carrying out its activities the observance of human and civil rights and freedoms when processing personal data, including the protection of the right to privacy, personal and family secrets
1.1-2: This Operator's policy regarding personal data processing (hereinafter - the Policy) applies to all information that the Operator may receive about visitors to the website https://exporteru.com

2.title: Basic concepts used in the Policy
2.2-1: Automated processing of personal data - processing of personal data using computer technology.
2.2-2: Blocking of personal data - temporary cessation of personal data processing (except in cases where processing is necessary to clarify personal data).
2.2-3: Website - a collection of graphic and information materials, as well as computer programs and databases, ensuring their availability on the Internet at the network address https://exporteru.com.
2.2-4: Personal data information system - a set of personal data contained in databases and information technologies and technical means that ensure their processing.
2.2-5: Depersonalization of personal data - actions as a result of which it is impossible to determine without using additional information the belonging of personal data to a specific User or other personal data subject.
2.2-6: Processing of personal data - any action (operation) or set of actions (operations) performed with or without the use of automation tools with personal data, including collection, recording, systematization, accumulation, storage, clarification (updating, changing), extraction, use, transfer (distribution, provision, access), depersonalization, blocking, deletion, destruction of personal data.
2.2-7: Operator - a state body, municipal body, legal or natural person, independently or jointly with other persons organizing and/or carrying out the processing of personal data, as well as determining the purposes of personal data processing, the composition of personal data to be processed, actions (operations) performed with personal data.
2.2-8: Personal data - any information relating directly or indirectly to a specific or identifiable User of the website https://exporteru.com.
2.2-9: Personal data permitted by the personal data subject for distribution - personal data to which an unlimited number of persons have access provided by the personal data subject by giving consent to the processing of personal data permitted by the personal data subject for distribution in the manner prescribed by the Personal Data Law.
2.2-10: User - any visitor to the website https://exporteru.com.
2.2-11: Provision of personal data - actions aimed at disclosing personal data to a certain person or a certain circle of persons.
2.2-12: Distribution of personal data - any actions aimed at disclosing personal data to an indefinite number of persons (transfer of personal data) or to familiarize with personal data an unlimited number of persons.
2.2-13: Cross-border transfer of personal data - transfer of personal data to the territory of a foreign state to a foreign state authority, foreign natural or foreign legal person.
2.2-14: Destruction of personal data - any actions as a result of which personal data is irretrievably destroyed with the impossibility of further recovery.

3.title: Basic rights and obligations of the Operator
3.3-1: The Operator has the right to: - receive reliable information and/or documents from the personal data subject; - continue processing personal data without the subject's consent in cases provided by Law; - independently determine the composition and measures to ensure the fulfillment of obligations.
3.3-2: The Operator is obliged to: - provide the personal data subject with information about their data upon request; - organize processing in accordance with legislation; - respond to subjects' requests; - report to the authorized body information upon request; - publish the Policy; - take measures to protect personal data; - stop transfer and destroy data in cases provided by Law; - fulfill other obligations established by legislation.

4.title: Basic rights and obligations of personal data subjects
4.4-1: Personal data subjects have the right to: - receive information about the processing of their personal data; - require clarification, blocking or destruction of data; - establish a condition for consent to data processing for marketing purposes; - withdraw consent; - appeal actions or inaction of the Operator; - exercise other rights provided by legislation.
4.4-2: Personal data subjects are obliged to: - provide the Operator with reliable data about themselves; - inform about changes to their data.
4.4-3: Persons who have provided false information about themselves or other persons without their consent are liable in accordance with the legislation of the Russian Federation.

5.title: Principles of personal data processing
5.5-1: Personal data processing is carried out on a legal and fair basis.
5.5-2: Personal data processing is limited to the achievement of specific, predetermined and lawful purposes.
5.5-3: Combining databases with incompatible processing purposes is not allowed.
5.5-4: Only personal data that meets the processing purposes is subject to processing.
5.5-5: The content and volume of processed data must correspond to the processing purposes.
5.5-6: The accuracy, sufficiency and relevance of personal data is ensured.
5.5-7: Personal data is stored no longer than required by processing purposes. After achieving the goals, data is destroyed or depersonalized.

rows.label: Processing purpose
rows.value: providing the User with access to services, information and/or materials contained on the website

rows.label: Personal data
rows.value:
• surname, first name, patronymic
• email address
• phone numbers
• year, month, date and place of birth
• photographs
• taxpayer identification number, date of registration, details of the certificate of registration with the tax authority

rows.label: Types of personal data processing
rows.value:
• Collection, recording, systematization, accumulation, storage, destruction and depersonalization of personal data
• Sending information letters to email address

rows.label: Processing purpose
rows.value: informing the User by sending emails

rows.label: Legal grounds
rows.value: • Federal Law "On Information, Information Technologies and Information Protection" dated July 27, 2006 N 149-FZ

7.title: Legal grounds for personal data processing
7.7-1: The Operator processes the User's personal data only if they are filled in and/or sent by the User independently through special forms located on the website https://exporteru.com. By filling in the relevant forms and/or sending their personal data to the Operator, the User agrees to this Policy.
7.7-2: The Operator processes depersonalized data about the User if this is allowed in the User's browser settings (saving cookies and using JavaScript technology is enabled).

8.title: Procedure for collection, storage, transfer and other types of personal data processing
8.text: The security of personal data processed by the Operator is ensured through the implementation of legal, organizational and technical measures necessary to fully comply with the requirements of current legislation in the field of personal data protection.
8.8-1: The Operator ensures the safety of personal data and takes all possible measures to exclude access to personal data by unauthorized persons.
8.8-2: The User's personal data will never, under any circumstances, be transferred to third parties, except in cases related to the execution of current legislation.
8.8-3: In case of inaccuracies in personal data, the User can update them independently by sending the Operator a notification to the email address support@exporteru.com with the mark "Personal data update".
8.8-4: The term of personal data processing is determined by the achievement of the purposes for which the personal data was collected, unless a different term is provided by agreement or current legislation.
8.8-5: The User can withdraw their consent to personal data processing at any time by sending a notification to the Operator to the email support@exporteru.com with the mark "Withdrawal of consent to personal data processing".
8.8-6: All information collected by third-party services, including payment systems and other communication operators, is stored and processed by these persons in accordance with their Privacy Policy.
8.8-7: The Operator is not responsible for the actions of third parties who gained access to information about the User as a result of their use of the Internet.
8.8-8: The Operatorstores personal data in a form that allows identifying the personal data subject no longer than required by the processing purposes, unless the storage period is established by legislation.

9.title: Cross-border transfer of personal data
9.9-1: Before starting cross-border transfer of personal data, the Operator is obliged to ensure that the foreign state to whose territory personal data is planned to be transferred provides reliable protection of the rights of personal data subjects.
9.9-2: Cross-border transfer of personal data to the territories of foreign states that do not meet the above requirements can be carried out only if there is written consent of the personal data subject to the cross-border transfer of their personal data and/or execution of an agreement to which the personal data subject is a party.

10.title: Cross-border transfer of personal data
10.10-1: Before starting activities on cross-border transfer of personal data, the Operator is obliged to notify the authorized body for the protection of the rights of personal data subjects of its intention to carry out cross-border transfer of personal data (such notification is sent separately from the notification of the intention to process personal data).
10.10-2: Before submitting the above notification, the Operator is obliged to obtain relevant information from the authorities of a foreign state, foreign natural persons, foreign legal entities to whom cross-border transfer of personal data is planned.

11.title: Confidentiality of personal data
11.11-1: The Operator and other persons who have gained access to personal data are obliged not to disclose to third parties and not to distribute personal data without the consent of the personal data subject, unless otherwise provided by federal law.

12.title: Final provisions
12.12-1: The User can receive any clarifications on issues of interest regarding the processing of their personal data by contacting the Operator using email info@exporteru.com.
12.12-2: This document will reflect any changes to the Operator's personal data processing policy. The Policy is valid indefinitely until replaced by a new version.
12.12-3: The current version of the Policy is freely available on the Internet at https://exporteru.com/privacy/.

titles.2: Rights and Obligations of the Parties

Agreement.text: This User Agreement (hereinafter referred to as the Agreement) governs the relationship between EXPORTERU LLC (hereinafter exporteru.com or Administration) on the one hand and the user of the website on the other. The website exporteru.com is not a mass media outlet.
Agreement.secondText:
By using the website, you agree to the terms of this Agreement.
If you do not agree with the terms of this Agreement, do not use exporteru.com!

2.1-title: The User has the right to:
2.1-text:
- search for information on the website
- receive information on the website
- create information for the website
- distribute information on the website
- comment on content posted on the website
- change user ratings
- copy information to other websites with attribution
- use website information for personal non-commercial purposes
- use website information for commercial purposes without special permission
2.2-title: The Administration has the right to:
2.2-text:
- at its sole discretion, create, modify, or cancel rules
- restrict access to any information on the website
- create, modify, or delete information
- delete user accounts
- refuse registration without explanation
2.3-text:
- provide accurate information
- ensure the security of personal data from third-party access
- update Personal Data provided during registration in case of changes
- not copy information from other sources
- when copying from other sources, include author attribution
- not distribute information promoting war, inciting national, racial, or religious hatred and hostility, or other content subject to criminal or administrative liability
- not disrupt the website’s functionality
- not mislead other Users
- not post advertising, erotic, pornographic, or offensive materials, as well as other information prohibited by Russian law
- not use scripts (programs) for automated data collection and/or interaction with the Website and its Services
2.4-text:
- maintain the operability of the website except in cases beyond its control
- ensure comprehensive protection of the User’s account
- provide all available User information to authorized government bodies as required by law

3.1-text:
- the user is personally fully responsible for the information they distribute
- the administration is not responsible for the accuracy of information copied from other sources
- the administration is not responsible for discrepancies between User expectations and the actual services received
- the administration is not responsible for services provided by third parties
- in case of force majeure (military actions, emergencies, natural disasters, etc.), the Administration does not guarantee the safety of information posted by the User or the uninterrupted operation of the resource

4.1-text:
This Agreement comes into effect upon any use of the website.
The Agreement ceases to be valid when a new version appears.
The Administration reserves the right to unilaterally amend this Agreement at its discretion.
The Administration does not notify users about changes in the Agreement.

Form.description: When contacting, describe your question or problem in detail, indicating links, screenshots or photos. We are open to any questions! We work around the clock without weekends and holidays.
Form.successMessage: Your message has been sent successfully!

MainPage.firstText: online platform for exporting goods from Russia. We help Russian companies find foreign counterparties and enter international markets. We specialize in wholesale supplies of products. Comprehensive support: from placement to concluding an export contract. Personal manager for the entire period of cooperation
MainPage.secondText: service for exporting goods from Russia. We offer support at all stages: selection of counterparties, negotiations, conclusion of deals. We work directly with suppliers and international buyers

catalogMeta.mainPageText: Exporteru provides many product categories for export and import. Every user can find the right product with optimal conditions.

AdvantagesSection.title: Advantages of working with us
AdvantagesSection.description: Why choose us? Because we make complex things simple, and reliable things accessible!
AdvantagesSection.advantage2: Access to a wide catalog of goods from Russia
AdvantagesSection.advantage3: Single channel for purchasing from different industries and regions of Russia
AdvantagesSection.advantage4: Exclusive terms and quotas from manufacturers for partners
AdvantagesSection.advantage5: Reduction of procurement costs and currency risks

Exports.title: Exporters across the country
Exports.description: You no longer need to search for suppliers in each region separately. We have gathered verified exporters from all over Russia for you.

LoginSlider.slide1Description: Work only with reliable companies that have passed quality and reputation checks.
LoginSlider.slide2Description: Your personal specialist will help find solutions and speed up cooperation.
LoginSlider.slide3Description: Get the best offers directly from manufacturers and save on purchases.
LoginSlider.slide4Description: Thousands of suppliers united to help you easily find the right goods and services.
